attributes.action: Lose 10 Numbers from National Lottery so people have a fair chance of winning.
attributes.additional_details: Go to National Lottery Facebook page and see who is supporting the changes?
attributes.background: The UK National Lottery is actually owned by a Canadian Pension fund,so who is controlling it? There have been many changes over the years but adding an extra 10 numbers and claiming there are more chances of winning is a lie.
